name: A Brief History of Flarbleball
description:
In the beginning...there was Flarbleball

Arrows or WASD to move around. You can kick the ball by holding down the mouse and charging up a shot, or just run into the ball. The choice is yours!

Also has xbox controller support on Windows for some reason.

Made for Xander Jam 3

Making one game a month in 2021, click here for more details!

Public Domain music:

The Columbians - Just Like A Rainbow

sanctus  benedictus by dee yan-key
